A Targeted Blend of High-Potency Vitamin C and Zinc for Immune Health Support* Rainbow Light® Counter Attack® gives you the immune health support you need to thrive every day. With an excellent source of zinc and high-potency vitamin C, this innovative formula promotes immune health and overall wellness. You also get three herbal blends, including four soothing botanicals to support a healthy immune response.* Supports healthy immune function with high-potency vitamin C and an excellent source of zinc* Provides immune system support with soothing botanicals: xanthium, yerba santa, polygala and mullein* Contains herbal blend to support immune response* Promotes overall wellness* *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. Adults—Take 2 tablets 2 times daily, with or between meals. Not to exceed 4 tablets per day. Limit use of this product to one week. Not for use in children, do not use during pregnancy or lactation. Consult a physician prior to use if you are taking medication or have a medical condition. This product contains naturally occurring salicylates; a chemical similar to the chemical contained in aspirin and could cause an allergic reaction to people allergic to aspirin. Highlights - Vegan tablets - Gluten-free - Does not contain: milk, tree nuts, peanuts, soy, eggs, fish, shellfish, or artificial flavors or sweeteners
